txt.en: Destroyed Orkish ladder-bridges in the Circle of Despair ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Orkish ladder-bridges can be found in the Circle of Despair.
The Orcs of Ugrukh么r's forces have begun to construct ladder-bridges over the Circle of Despair.

Orkish ladder-bridges can be found in the Circle of Despair.\n\nWhile working to secure the Circle of Despair, you encountered a number of Orkish ladder-bridges constructed by Ugrukh么r's Orcs to climb higher into Minas Morgul. You should destroy them.

While working to secure the Circle of Despair alongside Dornach, you noticed several crude ladder-bridges erected by Ugrukh么r's Orcs.

Presumably, the Orcs intend to avoid the perils of the Circle of Despair and gain an advantage over the Rangers now seeking shelter within Barad Arthir.

You should destroy the ladder-bridges before more of Ugrukh么r's forces are allowed to climb higher into the Dead City.
